about_the_game:
With mythic powers, hunt down the demon lords of The Godplant's Realm on your mission to purge the world of solar delirium. Slay any who stand in the way in this bizarre fast-paced 3D action-adventure game.

Become a Master of Motion

Gameplay is built on fast-paced first-person platforming. Climb, leap, swing, and wall-run along the path of the Wingless Owl. Dash through enemies standing in your way. Swim with force through underwater caverns.

Extinguish the Flame of the Sun

Unfold the prophecy of the Godplant as His most loyal servant, bring down the Sun Goddess Anju and end Her reign of madness. Cinematic moments, rich lore, and a unique art-style bring the world of Hand Eternal to life.

Battle with Demon Lords

Hunt down the enigmatic demon lords of Gizte and free their true forms from the Sun Goddess's wrath. Fight bosses in hand-crafted environments to usurp their abilities for your own gain.
